title: Hoshi no Umi no Amuri
synopsis: The 3D modeled anime is set in Year 019 of the Insonity Progressive Revolution - a future era in which mankind has evolved into a new species called Adapters. Three very young Adapter girls from Japan, China and France set out on a space adventure that will affect the rest of their species. (Source: animekon)

Adaptation.name: Hoshi no Umi no Amuri: Tsuki no Yami no Plugin

opening_themes: "Umi Tori Ka - Amuri Ver.- (海鳥花 -アムリVer.-)" by Yui Makino (ep 1)
"Yacchaou yo! (やっちゃおうよ!)" by Yui Makino & Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team (アムリ率いる宇宙少女ヴァンアレン隊) (ep 2)
ending_themes: "Yacchaou yo! (やっちゃおうよ!)" by Yui Makino & Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team (ep 1)
"Suzume no Heitai-san (すずめの兵隊さん)" by Michiru Aizawa (Lin, Yunque) & Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team (ep 2)
"Keruto no Umi de Kuyurarula... (ケルトの海でkuyuraruLa...)" by Momoko Saitou & Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team (ep 3)* Uchuu Shojo Van-aren Team = Yui Makino, Michiru Aizawa, and Momoko Saitou.
